sentences.en: He knows nothing of unprofessional matters.
sentences.cn: 与专业无关的事,他什么也不知道.

sentences.en: He was also fined $150 for unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 他还因行为违反了职业道德而被罚150美元。

sentences.en: I felt guilty about my unprofessional behaviour.
I made another unprofessional sacrifice to mere curiosity.
sentences.cn: 我纯粹出于好奇心,就又作了一次与我本行业务无关的牺牲.

sentences.en: It is totally unprofessional anywhere in the business environment.
sentences.cn: 我在电脑前面工作的时候最喜欢嚼口香糖.

sentences.en: Johnson was fired for unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊因为有违反职业道德的行为而被开除了。

sentences.en: Listen, I know this is unprofessional.
sentences.cn: 听着, 我知道你不够专业.

sentences.en: She was found guilty of unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 她因违反职业道德而被判罪。
那完全是不专业的,外行的.

sentences.en: The board considers your behaviour highly unprofessional.
sentences.cn: 董事会认为你的行为严重违反职业道德.

sentences.en: The new secretary had to endure a lot of unprofessional remarks.
sentences.cn: 新秘书必须承受许多非专业的批评.

sentences.en: The officers were severely reprimanded for their unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.cn: 军官们因违反职业规则而受到了严厉的斥责。

sentences.en: The reporter was accused of unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 那位记者被控有违反职业道德的行为.

sentences.en: The teacher was dismissed from his post for unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 这名教师因其行为违反职业道德而被解职.

sentences.en: This patch looks a bit unprofessional.
sentences.cn: 这块补丁有点像出自外行之手.

sentences.en: We thought of ourselves as impostors, succeeding despite being totally unprofessional.
sentences.cn: 我们认为自己是骗子, 虽然毫不专业但却意外成功.

words.tran_cn: 非职业性的，非专业的；外行的

trans.tran_cn: 非专业化的，外行的，违反职业道德标准的
